TEXT_EMAIL_CONFIG_INFO: The following is configuration for how emails should look when FastComments sends emails to your commenters. You don't have to enter anything if you don't want to customize this.
TEXT_FROM_NAME_EMAIL_NOTE: Note: From-Name and Email settings do not affect emails sent to administrators.
TITLE_AUTO_ADDED: Automatically added during trial period based on traffic to your account. This is done to ease setup, and only happens during the trial period.
TEXT_EMAIL_ERROR: Something looks wrong with this email. We've saved any other changes.
BUTTON_CLICK_TO_UPDATE_LOGO: Click to Update Logo for <%= domain.domain %>
BUTTON_CLICK_TO_SET_LOGO: Click to Set Logo for <%= domain.domain %>
TEXT_NO_DOMAINS_WARNING: Whoa! You have no domains. Your widgets will not be able to load until you associate one or more domains with your account.
